results.description: Willian's excellent second-half volley gives Chelsea victory over Lille in their second Champions League group stage match in France.
results.title: Lille 1-2 Chelsea: Willian volley earns Champions League win in France

results.description: Liverpool have beaten RB Salzburg in a Champions League thriller, while Chelsea earn crucial win in Lille - action and reaction.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool beat RB Salzburg in thriller, Willian gives Chelsea win in Lille - reaction
results.title: Champions League latest - Liverpool, Chelsea and Barcelona in action

results.description: Holders Liverpool will face Napoli, Salzburg and Genk in the Champions League group stage, while Tottenham will meet Bayern Munich.
results.title: Champions League draw: Liverpool drawn with Napoli, Tottenham to meet Bayern Munich

thumbnail.altText: Jurgen Klopp, Frank Lampard, Mauricio Pochettino, Pepe Guardiola

results.description: French club Lille sign Portugal midfielder Renato Sanches on a five-year deal from German champions Bayern Munich.
results.shortTitle: Lille sign Sanches from Bayern Munich
results.title: Renato Sanches: Lille sign midfielder from Bayern Munich

results.description: Arsenal sign Ivory Coast winger Nicolas Pepe from Lille for a club record fee of £72m.
results.title: Nicolas Pepe: Arsenal sign Lille winger for club record fee

results.description: Arsenal are hopeful of confirming the £72m club record signing of Ivory Coast winger Nicolas Pepe from Lille this week.
results.shortTitle: Arsenal close in on £72m Pepe deal
results.title: Nicolas Pepe: Arsenal close in on £72m deal for Lille winger

results.description: Arsenal reach an agreement with French club Lille to sign Ivory Coast winger Nicolas Pepe in a deal worth 80m euros (£72m).
results.shortTitle: Arsenal agree £72m deal for Lille's Pepe
results.title: Nicolas Pepe: Arsenal agree £72m deal for Lille winger

results.description: Paris St-Germain miss out on the chance to wrap up Ligue 1 for the second weekend in a row as they are thrashed by second-placed Lille.
results.shortTitle: Lille thrash PSG to delay title again
results.title: Lille 5-1 Paris St-Germain: Thrashing makes PSG wait for Ligue 1 title again

results.description: Rafael Leao is making a name for himself in Ligue 1 - what does the future hold for Lille's Portuguese forward.
results.title: Rafael Leao: The Lille forward dubbed the 'Portuguese Mbappe'

results.description: Mario Balotelli's Marseille debut ends in defeat in a match held up for 31 minutes after a firework thrown by a fan explodes close to players.
results.title: Marseille 1-2 Lille

results.description: Paris St-Germain break Tottenham's 58-year-old European record as they beat Lille to make it 12 consecutive wins at the start of the Ligue 1 season.
results.shortTitle: PSG break Spurs record with 12th win
results.title: Paris St-Germain 2-1 Lille: PSG break Spurs record with 12th win

results.description: Paris St-Germain maintain control at the top of Ligue 1 with a comfortable victory at Lille.
results.title: Lille 0-3 Paris Saint Germain

results.description: Lille part company with head coach Marcelo Bielsa just seven months after the former Argentina manager was appointed.
results.shortTitle: Lille part company with coach Bielsa
results.title: Marcelo Bielsa: Lille part company with Argentine coach

results.description: Leaders Paris St-Germain recover from a first Ligue 1 defeat this season to beat Lille and briefly go 12 points clear.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 3-1 Lille

results.description: Lille suspend their coach Marcelo Bielsa after a poor start to the season left them second bottom of Ligue 1.
results.title: Marcelo Bielsa: Lille suspend coach after latest defeat

results.description: Five fans are seriously injured as a barrier collapses at the front of a stand during a French top-flight match.
results.shortTitle: Injuries as barrier collapses in stand
results.title: Amiens v Lille: Fans injured as barrier collapses at Ligue 1 match

thumbnail.altText: Police and stadium staff help the injured supporters

results.description: Radamel Falcao takes his season's tally up to 11 Ligue 1 goals - after only seven games - with a double as Monaco beat Lille.
results.title: Lille 0-4 Monaco

results.description: Lille give two different outfield players a spell in goal as they lose at Strasbourg.
results.title: Strasbourg 3-0 Lille

results.description: He was Pep Guardiola and Mauricio Pochettino's mentor, but why is Lille boss Marcelo Bielsa dubbed "the best coach in the world"?
